Office Phone: Alcohol and Substance Use Helpline: 1.877.327.4636Exercise in Pregnancy: 1.866.937.7678 HIV and HIV Treatment in Pregnancy Helpline: 1.888.246.5840Motherisk Helpline: 1.877.439.2744Nausea and Vomiting in Pregnancy Helpline: 1.800.436.8477
Service Details: - Provides helplines for pregnancy related issues- Website provides targeted information for mothers and professionals Services: - Alcohol and Substance Use Helpline: provides information about the effects of alcohol, nicotine and drugs like marijuana, cocaine and ecstasy during pregnancy and breastfeeding  - Exercise in Pregnancy Helpline:  provides evidence-based recommendations on how to safely exercise during pregnancy, and after delivery when new mothers begin breastfeeding- HIV and HIV Treatment in Pregnancy: provides information about the possible effects of HIV and HIV treatment during pregnancy - Motherisk Helpline: provides information about safety of various exposures in pregnancy and breastfeeding, including over-the-counter medications, herbal products, chemicals, chronic disease and infection, x-rays, and everyday exposures - Nausea and Vomiting in Pregnancy Helpline: provides information on "morning sickness" and how to treat it
